An **eldritch ki-rin**, A is a monster that appears in [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"). It is a "fallen" variant of the [ki-rin](/wiki/Ki-rin "Ki-rin").

## Generation

Unlike normal ki-rin, eldritch ki-rin primarily generate in Gehennom, as well as the floors below [Medusa's Island](/wiki/Medusa%27s_Island "Medusa's Island").

## Strategy

As a steed, the eldritch ki-rin is effectively an alternative to the standard ki-rin for chaotic [Knights](/wiki/Knights "Knights"), who cannot tame ki-rin; likewise, eldritch ki-rin cannot be tamed by lawful Knights.

## Encyclopedia Entry

The ki-rin is a strange-looking flying creature. It has scales, a mane like a lion, a tail, hooves, and a horn. It is brightly colored, and can usually be found flying in the sky looking for good deeds to reward.  
  
An eldritch ki-rin is one that started its celestial life as a normal lawful ki-rin, and at some point lost its way and started following a path of darkness. In nearly all aspects, they are identical to their lawful brethren. The differences are that their alignment is strongly chaotic, and their appearance is extremely dark.

- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Eldritch_ki-rin\&action=edit)*

html:
Eldritch ki-rin

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
A eldritch ki-rin (No tile)
Difficulty 21
Attacks Kick 2d4, Kick 2d4, Head butt 3d6, Spell-casting 2d6
A eldritch ki-rin (No tile)
Difficulty 21
Attacks

Kick 2d4, Kick 2d4, Head butt 3d6, Spell-casting 2d6

Base level 16
Base experience 472
Speed 18
Base AC -5
Base MR 90
Alignment -15 (chaotic)
Frequency (by normal means) 1 (Very rare)
Genocidable No
Weight 1450
Nutritional value 400
Size Large
Resistances cold, electricity, sleep, poison
Resistances conveyed None

A eldritch ki-rin:

  • can fly.
  • has no hands.
  • does not eat. (*)
  • is not a valid polymorphable form.
  • is a lord to its kind.
  • can follow you to other levels.
  • is nasty.
  • is strong.
  • has infravision.
  • can be seen through infravision.
  • never leaves a corpse.
Reference EvilHack - monst.c, line 1429

An eldritch ki-rin, A is a monster that appears in EvilHack. It is a "fallen" variant of the ki-rin.

Generation

Unlike normal ki-rin, eldritch ki-rin primarily generate in Gehennom, as well as the floors below Medusa's Island.

Strategy

As a steed, the eldritch ki-rin is effectively an alternative to the standard ki-rin for chaotic Knights, who cannot tame ki-rin; likewise, eldritch ki-rin cannot be tamed by lawful Knights.

Encyclopedia Entry

The ki-rin is a strange-looking flying creature. It has scales, a mane like a lion, a tail, hooves, and a horn. It is brightly colored, and can usually be found flying in the sky looking for good deeds to reward.

An eldritch ki-rin is one that started its celestial life as a normal lawful ki-rin, and at some point lost its way and started following a path of darkness. In nearly all aspects, they are identical to their lawful brethren. The differences are that their alignment is strongly chaotic, and their appearance is extremely dark.
